tertiary_stats_en: Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
tertiary_stats_full_en: [23.5-32.5]% Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
effect_en:
Ancients you summon are empowered.
Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds when he leaps.
Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [X] damage while he whirlwinds.
Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [X] damage over 4 seconds when he upheaves the ground.
flavor_en: "Rise clansmen and reclaim our trampled honor! Ancients' blood runs through us all! We are storms - earth breaking, maelstrom wielding. The fire of the gods burn still! They are with us!" - Ealda

secondary_stats_en: Casting a Mobility Skill grants +100% Movement Speed for 2 seconds
effect_en: Mobility Skills are always Shadow Imbued with [60-120%] increased potency. Lucky Hit: Damaging an Elite or Boss with a Mobility Skill has up to a [40-80%] chance to instantly triggers a free Shadow Imbuement explosion.
flavor_en: The Viz-Jaq'taar descended on the mages indiscriminately and silently as a plague. The wise took flight, whilst the foolish fortified their dwellings as if walls or wards protected from shadow.

data.name: Assassin's Stride

data.flavor: The Viz-Jaq'taar descended on the mages indiscriminately and silently as a plague. The wise took flight, whilst the foolish fortified their dwellings as if walls or wards protected from shadow.

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
tertiary_stats_full_en: [13.5-22.5]% Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
effect_en:
Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to 3 enemies. When it returns, it Consumes 6 Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After Consuming 66 total Mana, the bolt explodes for [X] Lightning Damage.

Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
flavor_en: "Do not confuse your manipulation of lightning as control. The azure flame is its own master and needs no hand to wield it. You are merely a conduit for its chaos." -Ascribed to the mage Woh

secondary_stats_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to gain a stack of Frenzy
effect_en: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2 . While at maximum stacks, you deal [30-60%] increased damage and your other Skills gain [35-55%] increased Attack Speed.
flavor_en: "The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear." - Captain Dervin

effect_en:
When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill Consumes all of your energy and deals [0.25-0.75%] increased damage per Energy Consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores 25 Energy.
flavor_en: "Genai grew proud and fond of boasting of her hunting prowess. She claimed she was fast enough to catch even the spirit Leraye, who cursed her for such an insult." - Fable of Genai's Twenty Trials

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
tertiary_stats_full_en: [36.5-50]% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
effect_en: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additonal Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining [120-160%] damage and [42-50%] Size per additional Corpse consumed.
flavor_en: "The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion." - Notes of Scholar Kamien

tertiary_stats_en: Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking up a Blood Orb
tertiary_stats_full_en: [103.5-135]% Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking Up a Blood Orb
effect_en: When you pick up [10-3] Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
flavor_en: "The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor." - Barrett's Book of Implements

effect_en: Your Summoning Skills have a [3-7%] chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden. You deal x [20-50%] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
flavor_en: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.

data.name: Blood Moon Breeches
data.effect: Your Summoning Skills have a [3-7%] chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden. You deal x [20-50%] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
data.flavor: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.

tertiary_stats_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal X Shadow Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore X Primary Resource
tertiary_stats_full_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal [8500-13500] Shadow Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66 Primary Resource
effect_en:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [100-200%] increased damage to Frozen enemies and Bosses.

Every 800 times you damage enemies with Darkness Skills, all Nearby enemies are Feared for 0.25 seconds before Freezing for 3 more seconds.
flavor_en: "My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever." - The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI

Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [240%] increased damage to Frozen enemies and Bosses.

effect_en:
When you would take direct damage, it is instead distributed as Poisoning over the next 10 seconds but increased by [30-0%] .

Lucky Hit: Direct damage has up to a 25% chance based on your Poisoned Life percentage to infect an enemy with Touch of Death.
flavor_en: T'an seized a spear and drove it thrice into his mad brother Tan. Alas, the craftier of the twin gods wove one last cunning snare. In place of blood, the wound wept venom and consumed all in its wake.

data.name: Craze of the Dead God

effect_en: Each time you use a Skill with a Resource Cost, gain x [5-15%] increased damage and Resource Cost is increased by +30% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
flavor_en: The prince of Hatred, fair as maggots over carrion. He claims no throne, crafts no realms, reigning over only a blackened, bitter heart. Some legends name him banished, while others dread his return.

tertiary_stats_en: Blood Surge Drains + [X] Times from Elites
tertiary_stats_full_en: Blood Surge Drains [2-3] Times from Elites
effect_en: Casting Blood Surge consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing [X] damage. This damage is increased by x10% for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to x50%, as well as by x20% for each Corpse consumed.
flavor_en: In the blood dancer's grasp, a victim lies, A vessel dried 'neath darkened skies. Their life extinguished, veins burst and drained, In Cruor's embrace, forever enchained.

flavor_en: "Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?" - Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma

tertiary_stats_en: +1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
tertiary_stats_full_en: 1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
effect_en: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing [X] damage. Damage is increased by 10% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50%.
flavor_en: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.

tertiary_stats_en: Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
tertiary_stats_full_en: [21-30]% Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
effect_en: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active will cause your boulders to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by x [30-50%] for each one currently rotating. You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.
flavor_en: "As the hateful mob beat on his door, he gripped the pulsing shard tightly and screamed for calm. When he opened his eyes, all that greeted him was silence and the blood-smeared ruins of his cottage."

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
tertiary_stats_full_en: [16-25]% Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
effect_en: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal [X] Physical damage over 2 seconds. Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a [20-30%] chance to spawn two instead.
flavor_en: When Arreat was sundered, the world quaked. The Druid Aglainn journeyed far to chronicle the aftermath. Grief-stricken by the great mountain king's fall, he rent the earth anew.

effect_en: When you would be damaged for at least 40% of your Maximum Life at once, it is instead distributed over the next 3 seconds and reduced by x [10-30%] .
flavor_en: Despite the Light's blessings, countless Knights Penitent were hewn apart by the infernal hordes. Remnants of their steel lie scattered through the Hells  dwindling lights in the chaos.

tertiary_stats_en: Damage Reduction per Crackling Energy Charge
Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
tertiary_stats_full_en: [1.4-2]% Damage Reduction per Crackling Energy Charge
[16-25]% Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
effect_en:
Crackling Energy now gains x10% damage for every level in Shock Skills you have equipped and enemies hit have a 2% chance to refund a charge. Upon reaching maximum Crackling Energy, you rapidly unleash all charges on the closest enemy to you dealing x [40-80%] increased damage. 
You cannot gain charges from hits while rapidly discharging.
flavor_en: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.

flavor_en: "We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on." - Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior

secondary_stats_en: Conjuration Cooldowns are Reduced by 0.3 Seconds when a Frozen Orb Explodes
tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
tertiary_stats_full_en: [13-17.5]% Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
effect_en:
Casting Frozen Orb has a [35-65%] chance to spawn a random Conjuration on your Action Bar when it explodes.

Lucky Hit: Your Conjurations have up to a [50-90%] chance to launch a Frozen Orb at Nearby enemies.
flavor_en: Winterglass refracts light and also manipulates mana - forming complex arrays of spells and enchantments. These distinct characteristics posses great power, yet the outcomes remain unpredictable.

effect_en: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals [70-100%] of normal damage.
flavor_en: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.

effect_en: When you Stun, Freeze, or Immobilize an Elite, you Pull In all Nearby enemies and deal [30-60%] increased damage to them for 3 seconds. Can only occur once every 12 seconds. Against Bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.
flavor_en: "The Sahptev faithful believe in a thousand and one gods. If it takes me as many lifetimes, I will find and kill them all." - Gaspar Stilbian, Veradani Outcast

tertiary_stats_en: Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
tertiary_stats_full_en: [13.5-22.5]% Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
effect_en: Whirlwind explodes every 3 seconds as Fire damage dealing [300-600%] increased damage. Critical Strikes with Whirlwind reduce the time until the next explosion by 0.4 seconds down to 1 second.
flavor_en: "The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work." - Barrett's Book of Implements

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
tertiary_stats_full_en: [13-17.5%] Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
effect_en:
Your Basic Skills are empowered. Damaging an enemy with a Basic Skill causes them to take x [20-40%] increased damage from your other Basic Skills for 10 seconds.
Reap attacks 10% faster.
Decompose now spawns a Corpse every 0.5 seconds.
Hemorrhage triggers an additional burst on the initial target.
Bone Splinters pierce through enemies

effect_en:
According to your secondary Spirit Hall choice, your Skills are all additionally Jaguar, Eagle, Gorilla, or Centipede Skills.

Your Skills deal x [20-40]% increased damage per Spirit type they have.

secondary_stats_en: Casting Bone Spear Reduces Blood Wave's Cooldown by 2 Seconds
effect_en:
Blood Wave is additionally a Bone Skill that spawns a Bone Prison at its end point and increases your Blood Skill damage by x [20-40%] for 8 seconds when cast.

Bone Spear is additionally a Blood Skill that consumes a Corpse to launch a Bone Spear from it,. draining 10% of your Maximum Life on hit.

Only the player's Bone Spears can consume corpses.
flavor_en: The tears of Linarian turned bloody over Indira's torn body. Many days, unyielding, he poured his magic into sundered bone and rended sinew. Though the flesh did mend, his beloved did not rise...

flavor_en: Initially an unpopular choice to replace Mendeln as Deathspeaker, Daros quickly proved his worth with the creation of this masterpiece.

Lucky Hit: While you have an active Bone Storm, hitting an enemy has up to a [54%] chance to spawn a Bone Storm around their location. 
Each Sacrifice bonus increases this chance by 25% and allows you to spawn 1 more Bone Storm. Each active Bone Storm grants 20% Critical Strike Damage up to 100%.
flavor_en: Initially an unpopular choice to replace Mendeln as Deathspeaker, Daros quickly proved his worth with the creation of this masterpiece.

effect_en:
While your Spirit Hall choices match: 
Their bonuses are 100% more potent.
 Skills of their Base Spirit gain [20-60%] Vigor Cost Reduction.
 Skills of their Base Spirit gain [20-60%] Cooldown Reduction.
flavor_en: During a Trial of Mists, a small spirit noticed an unclaimed boy. In pity, it spared him. "I will follow you always," vowed the boy. He remained true even after Ah Bulan called the spirit home.

effect_en: Gain 60 maximum Resource. When taking damage, 75% is Drained as 2 Resource for every 1% of Maximum Life you would have lost.
flavor_en: "Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe." - Last words of Master Selig

tertiary_stats_full_en: [16-25]% Movement Speed while Cataclysm is Active
effect_en: While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal x [20-40%] increased damage. Cataclysm receives your Lightning Bolt benefits.
flavor_en: A singed wedding band, faintly crackling. It evokes an old rhyme where a bride receives a ring from her beloved, causing them to be struck thrice by lightning. Only the bride was unscathed.

effect_en: You are Blood Lanced, and when Blood Lance would deal damage to you it instead Fortifies you for [1-4%] of your Maximum Life and has a 10% chance to form a Blood Orb. Blood Lance deals [10-40%] increased damage.
flavor_en: "The Cathedral of Light's earliest attempts at crafting their penitent armor was to infuse the plate with painful blood magic, before such acts were deemed heretical." - Barrett's Book of Implements

effect_en:
Every 2 seconds, you randomly mark a Nearby enemy. Marked enemies are Vulnerable, and your attacks against them are guaranteed to Critically Strike and Overpower.

Hitting a marked enemy 10 times clears the mark from them.
flavor_en: In the days when Ajaw Y'ishich ruled Nahantu, the phoenix constellation's crown fell in burning glory. From it was forged a blade that withered valor, heralding an age of despair.

data.name: Nesekem, The Herald

Damage Reduction for Each Active Ball Lightning
Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
effect_en: Casting Ball Lightning instead creates a separate static field around you that damages all enemies within for [210-250%] Ball Lightning's damage per active ball. You are Unhindered as long as the field is active.
flavor_en: "Children and beast do tremble at thunder's roar, but the wise know to fear the silence of lightning." - Okun, of the Zann Esu

effect_en:
Hydra is now a Core Skill and always Summons a 3-headed Hydra whose attacks explode on impact.

For each head above 3 that it would have had, the Hydra instead grows larger and deals x [50-100%] increased damage.

effect_en: Death Blow creates a shockwave, dealing [60-80%] of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blow's Cooldown.
flavor_en: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.

tertiary_stats_full_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a [13.5-22.5]% Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds
effect_en: Damaging enemies with a Non-Basic Skill marks them for 3 seconds. When a Basic Skill first hits a marked enemy, the Basic Skill's damage is echoed to all marked enemies, dealing x [75-125%] increased damage.
flavor_en: Crafted from fragments of Duriel's carapace, wearing these gloves, or being struck by them, causes an agonizing sensation akin to pushing one's hands through a thousand shards of glass.

effect_en: Bone Prison traps a larger area and fires [10-30] Bone Splinters at enemies trapped within. Increase your Maximum Essence by 2 for 10 seconds each time these Bone Splinters hit an enemy.
flavor_en: "Essence flows endlessly, shifting between vessels. It is through Trag'Oul, keeper of all known and unknown, that we serve as custodians, directing essence to travel new paths." -Mendeln ul-Diomed

data.name: Path of Trag'Oul

tertiary_stats_en: All Stats per Ferocity or Resolve Stack
tertiary_stats_full_en: [3-4] All Stats per Ferocity or Resolve Stack
effect_en:
While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain [1-7] Vigor per second.

Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.
flavor_en: "In Natsalarwaka, no blood shall mar the earth. Even bitter enemies must forgo their blades before entering the haven. Breaking this accord will invoke Wasipotsu's wrath." - Oral Umbuntu Scripture

tertiary_stats_en: Critical Strike Chance Against Chilled Enemies
tertiary_stats_full_en: [4-6]% Critical Strike Chance Against Chilled Enemies
effect_en: You leave behind a trail of frost that Chills enemies. You deal [12-25%] more damage to Chilled enemies.
flavor_en: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.

flavor_en: "To commune with spirits, listen to whispers unseen. Root yourself to the earth and let its pulse still the mind. Hear the ancient guardians. They rise to aid you."  Ysevete, the First Spiritborn

effect_en: After spending 100 Fury within 5 seconds, your next non-Channeled Core or Weapon Mastery Skill Cast within 5 seconds is a guaranteed Critical Strike and deals x [50-80%] bonus Critical Strike Damage.
flavor_en: "Anger brings strength but clouds the mind. You must learn to focus your fury, direct it with purpose. Keep our sacred duty at the forefront of your mind, always." -Talic, to Madawc

flavor_en: "Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough." - Unknown

tertiary_stats_en: Movement Speed for 2 Seconds After Killing an Enemy
tertiary_stats_full_en: [17.5-23]% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds After Killing an Enemy
effect_en:
Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 50% and every kill grants you [1-7] Vigor.

While you have any Ferocity, your Poisoning effects deal their damage across 33% of the normal duration.
flavor_en: At midday thundered the first brother, Nyamoyo, lord of predators. Survival is his blessing, hunting is his prayer. Honor him and prowess shall be your reward." - The Nit S, Verse IV

data.name: Ring of the Midday Hunt

effect_en: Rend's duration is increased by [4-8] seconds. Damaging enemies with Brawling Skills applies 2 stacks of Rend's Bleed. This can only affect each enemy once every 1 second.
flavor_en: "The hunger, it starts so small, like a tickle in the back of your mind. You believe the lie that you still have control until you're so far gone you can't even recognize yourself." - Varyana

effect_en:
You automatically activate the following equipped Skills on Corpses around you:
Raise Skeleton every [2-1] seconds.
Corpse Explosion every [2-1] seconds.
Corpse Tendrils every [12-6] seconds.
flavor_en: The mere proximity of a practitioner of such dark arts can rouse the dead and disturb those souls who have earned their rest.

tertiary_stats_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
Chance for Pestilent Swarms to deal Double Damage
tertiary_stats_full_en: Lucky Hit: Up to a [43.3-47.3]% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
effect_en:
A Pestilent Swarm spawns from you every 4 seconds, dealing [X] Poison damage per hit.

Your Pestilent Swarms now orbit around you and generate 3 Vigor per hit.
flavor_en: "Within this corpse-bound carapace we writhe. Chaotic winds converge to churn your bones. Our beat and breath a ceaseless war to break. The wretched cyclone black beyond the bounds." - Balazan's Dream

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Core Skills to Hit Twice
tertiary_stats_full_en: [26-35]% Chance for Core Skills to Hit Twice
effect_en:
Your Core Skills are now additionally Basic Skills and free to cast.

When cast at Maximum Vigor, your Core Skills Consume all Vigor to return to full damage, cast at their largest Size, and become guaranteed Critical Strikes, with x [0.15-0.75%] increased Critical Strike Damage for each point of Vigor Consumed this way.
flavor_en: "Beyond the world disc doth lie the keeper serpent Kepeleke. Ceaseless the serpent grows, and thus must ever consume his own tail, lest the world be overtaken." - Lintel XII

data.name: Rod of Kepeleke

flavor_en: "Beyond the world disc doth lie the keeper serpent Kepeleke. Ceaseless the serpent grows, and thus must ever consume his own tail, lest the world be overtaken." - Lintel XII

tertiary_stats_full_en: [26-35%] Chance for Pulverize to Hit Twice
effect_en: If no puddle is around you, Pulverize forms a puddle that guarantees its own Overpowers and deals [200-600%] of its normal damage as Poisoning over 7 seconds. Pulverize causes all close puddles to splash [20-60%] of their total damage within their areas and around them. Pulverize radius increase will affect the size of the puddle and its splashes.

Chance for Army of the Dead to Deal Double Damage

[32-50]% Chance for Army of the Dead to Deal Double Damage
effect_en:
Your Summons' damage afflict enemies with Vampiric Curse. Consuming a Corpse also contributes a soul to Vampiric Curse, which can now stack up to 20 souls.

Army of the Dead can now unleash the souls from Vampiric Curse, causing both Army of the Dead and the souls to deal x [15-25%] increased damage per soul unleashed.

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
tertiary_stats_full_en: [26-35]% Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
effect_en:
Your Basic Skills deal x [80-120%] increased damage and always use their 3rd attack.

Every 3rd cast of a Basic Skill strikes three times.
flavor_en: To the silent heavens, the hunter Etzlek raised his staff and smote the numen. "Release her!" came his cries as desecrated the hallowed ground. On the third strike, the spirit answered...

tertiary_stats_en: Evade Grants Movement Speed for 1.5 Seconds
tertiary_stats_full_en: Evade Grants [16-25]% Movement Speed for 1.5 Seconds
effect_en:
Casting Dark Shroud makes you Immune for 2 seconds but your Evade Cooldown is increased by [9-3] seconds. 

Evading while Dark Shroud is active leaves behind an explosion that deals [X] Shadow Damage and Pulls In enemies.
flavor_en:
"Auriel alone saw past Lucion's guise. With Al'maiesh aloft, she smote the vile prince. Hatred's seed feigned death and waited, loath to enter the Abyss again." - The Great
Conflict, Tome I

effect_en: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. When you consume Precision casting a Skill, that Skill gains x [20-60%] increased Critical Strike Damage and you gain [30-60] Energy.
flavor_en: "Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night. - Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt

effect_en: Your Healing Potion no longer Heals instantly, instead it grants a Barrier for 200% of the healing for 4 seconds. You gain [10-30%] Damage Reduction while you have a Barrier and may drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
flavor_en: "To create such an artifact would require an impossible mastery over alchemy, transmutation and the subtle magics of the soul. By all rights, it should not exist, yet it does."

effect_en:
Meteor's Mana cost is replaced with a [5-2.5] second Cooldown and 3 total Charges. 

Casting Meteor drops 3 additional Meteors around the target. Its Enchantment and Enhancement drop 1 additional Meteor instead.
flavor_en: "The elders say they saw a star falling from the sky many years ago. A sign from the heavens that the end times were nigh. A rallying cry to take up arms and protect Sanctuary!" - Crusader Hamilton

tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
tertiary_stats_full_en: [21-30]% Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
effect_en:
While Channeling Stone Burst and for 2 seconds afterwards, you gain 15% Damage Reduction.

Stone Burst's final explosion deals x [15-20%] increased damage, further increased by x [15-20%] for each size increase.
flavor_en: Long ago, the Stone Clan laid the foundations of Old Kurast. They shaped earthen marvels, but wars with the Vizjerei turned chisel into spear. Now the only stone they wield is when cast against foe.

secondary_stats_en: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice is Now Chance to Cast a Super Ball Lightning
tertiary_stats_en: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
effect_en:
Ball Lightning splashes on impact dealing [260-300%] of its total damage instantly and Stunning enemies for 1 second if it reaches its Maximum Range.
Super Ball Lightnings are larger, deal x125% more damage, have a higher Lucky Hit Chance, and its Stun duration is increased to 3 seconds.
flavor_en: The height of the Moon Clan's power brought a beast that instilled dread upon Khanduras. More demon than Khazra, the one dubbed the Stormhorn left charred brands where cities once stood.

effect_en:
Picking up a Storm Feather forms a firestorm around you for 8 seconds dealing [X] Fire damage every 0.5 seconds.

Every 5 additional Storm Feathers you pick up intensifies the firestorm, increasing its damage by x100% but not refreshing its duration. Storm Feathers are now Jaguar Skills, and the firestorm is an Eagle, Jaguar, and Storm Feather Skill.

effect_en: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your damage by [10-20%] for 8 seconds, stacking once per Element. Casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different Element.
flavor_en: "Fool said he dug it out of the sands near Lut Gholein with a few other 'worthless trinkets'. I hid my delight at receiving such a treasure in exchange for a meager handful of coins." Rakhaan

effect_en: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain [8-15%] Maximum Resistance to that damage type for 6 seconds. Can only apply to one damage type at a time.

effect_en:
Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Golems grants an additional Skeletal Mage for each Minion sacrificed.

When a Skeletal Mage attacks enemies 25 times without dying it upgrades to a Skeletal Arch-Mage.

Skeletal Arch-Mages teleport to safety when attacked and their attacks occasionally shatter on impact dealing [50-100%] increased damage to the target and up to 3 additional targets.

secondary_stats_en: Attacks Reduce Ultimate Cooldown by 0.4 Seconds
tertiary_stats_full_en: Casting Ultimate Skills Restores [40-52] Primary Resource
effect_en:
Casting an Ultimate Skill grants or amplifies its matching Primary Spirit Hall Bonus with [200-300%] potency for 15 seconds.

Your Ultimate Skills each gain an additional Skill Type:
 The Seeker is a Focus Skill.
 The Hunter is a Mobility Skill.
 The Devourer is a Potency Skill.
 The Protector is a Defensive Skill.
flavor_en: "Fear not the limits of your flesh, Spiritborn!  As our ancestors said: wshe nak pa! Transcend your being!" - Maka
